articles.description: Journey Brown -- Penn State's top running back in 2019 -- is retiring from football after doctors diagnosed him with a serious heart condition
articles.content:
Journey Brown -- Penn State's top running back in 2019 -- is retiring from football after doctors diagnosed him with a serious heart condition
It's called hypertrophic cardiomyopathy -- a thickening… [+1636 chars]
